DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety efficacy Green Light PVP ( Photoselective Vaporisation Prostate ) compare open prostatectomy treat benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) .
DOC.brief_title: KTP Green Light Prostatectomy Compared With Open Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: Men undergo surgery BPH prostate size 100cc Previous prostate surgery Carcinoma prostate Neurogenic bladder Bladder carcinoma
